column2:
Search for a product: Positive 
search
column3:
This test case is intended to verify
the functionality of search in Amazon
column4:
1. Navigate to the Amazon home page.
2. Enter the product name "Iphone 6S" in search field.
3. Click submit button.
column5:
1. Page should show the search product page with a search field for entering the product name and submit button.
2. Product name must be entered from the test case.
3. Page should respond back with the list of Apple iPhone 6S products

column2:
Search for a product: Empty 
search
column3:
This test case is intended to verify
that empty search should not given any error message
column4:
1. Navigate to the Amazon home page.
2. Do not enter anything in search field.
3. Click submit button.
column5:
1. Page should show the search product page with a search field for entering the product name and submit button.
2. Product name must be entered from the test case.
3. Page should respond back with the list of Apple iPhone 6S products
